item.title: Spring Framework Master Class
item.description: From https://udemy.com/course/spring-tutorial-for-beginners/. Work for this can be found at https://github.com/HenryFBP/Spring-Framework-Master-Class Work from the instructor can be found at https://github.com/in28minutes/spring-master-class/tree/master Section 1. Intro to Spring What is Spring? A: It’s a Dependency Injection Framework. What is DI? What is a dependency?? Dependency Below, the web layer depends on the business layer. The business layer depends on the data layer. Etc. Typical code may have a service that is tightly coupled with some implementation of an algorithm, i.
